transcript:
Ah, you want it as if a tired person is *speaking*. Here's a short paragraph in that style:

"Man… I’m so tired I can’t even think straight. My whole body feels like it's made of lead. I just wanna lie down and forget everything for a while. Even talking feels like too much right now. I’ve been running on empty all day… I don’t even know how I’m still up."
analysis: I notice you're experiencing anger. These are natural human emotions. When feeling angry, it's helpful to take deep breaths and identify what's triggering this emotion.

transcript: hello I know I feel so tired today I slept for 8 hours but I don't know what's happening to me please help me figure out what's my problem
analysis: I'm here to listen. Your feelings are valid, whatever they may be. Sometimes putting words to our emotions can help us understand ourselves better.

transcript: hello I feel bad today I just want you to know how to fix my mood and help me get better
analysis: I'm here to listen. Your feelings are valid, whatever they may be. Sometimes putting words to our emotions can help us understand ourselves better.
